name: Orbit Wars | 1Hour Game Jam #0
description:
-= THIS IS A TWO PLAYER GAME =-

Controls:

MOVE - A and D for the Blue Spaceship | Left and Right arrow  keys for the Red Spaceship

SHOOT - W for the Blue Spaceship | Up arrow for the Red Spaceship

RESPAWN WHEN YOU DIE - S for the blue spaceship | Down arrow for the Red Spaceship

This was supposed to be my entry for the November 25th 1 Hour Game Jam, but I failed to code this game in 1 hour, so I didn't submit. This game was coded in 2 hours instead.

The goal is to kill the opponent 10 times.

All assets are from http://opengameart.org/
